pkgmetadata.longdescription: Overview========walkdir is a simple set of iterator tools intended to make iteasy to manipulate and filter the output of os.walk() in a waythat is also easily applicable to any source iterator thatproduces data in the same format.It offers tools such as:- glob-style filtering for file and directory names- depth limiting for directory recursion- flattening of output into simple sequences of path names- detection of symlink loops when following symlinks
